'''''SEVEN 26''''' is the twenty-sixth volume of the [[Marion E. Wade Center]]'s annual journal ''[[SEVEN]]'', published in [[2009]].<ref name="jstor" />
==Contents==
*"Conversing with Dante: Relational Assent in Williams and MacDonald"
**By: [[Kirstin Jeffrey Johnson]]
*"Stoic Rationality and Divine Madness in ''Till We Have Faces''"
**By: Dale Sullivan
*"Vocation in Work: Dorothy L. Sayers and Economic Issues"
**By: Christine M. Fletcher
*"That Hideous Latin in ''That Hideous Strength''"
**By: Amy E.K. Vail
*"Dorothy L. Sayers Writings about Work, the Economy and Social Conditions: An Annotated Bibliography"
**Christine M. Fletcher
*"A Dialogue Concluded: 'Enjoyment' and 'Contemplation' as Used in Owen Barfield and C.S. Lewis's 'Great War'"
**Norbert Feinendegen and Stephen Thorson<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/article_index|articlename=Contents By Volume|website=[https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/index VII: Journal of the Marion E. Wade Center]|accessed=13 August 2025}}</ref>
